proposal1.heroHeadline: Duckiee is losing 100 hours annually writing proposals. Here's the breakdown.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, crafting a Duckiee proposal is a lengthy task. With our system, it's done in 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Every delay in proposal writing is an ongoing drain on resources.

problems.title: Time Bleed
problems.description: Each proposal takes 5 hours, totaling 500 hours annually. Those are hours not spent designing or developing for clients.

problems.title: Missed Opportunities
problems.description: Delayed proposals mean missed client acquisition. Every day waiting is a potential loss of new business.

problems.title: Resource Drain
problems.description: Allocating staff to proposal writing pulls them away from project delivery. This costs Duckiee approximately ¬£10,000 a year.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Manual proposals risk inconsistency. Inconsistency weakens brand trust and potentially loses projects.

problems.title: High Stress
problems.description: Pressure to meet proposal deadlines creates stress, leading to burnout. Burnout reduces productivity and creativity.

problems.title: Proposal Errors
problems.description: Errors in proposals can lead to client mistrust. Correcting these errors costs additional time and resources.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces all these inefficiencies with seamless automation.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Proposals currently take hours to draft manually. Our system delivers complete proposals in under a minute.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual creation risks brand inconsistency. Our AI ensures every proposal is perfectly branded and client-ready.

solutions.title: Real-Time Tracking
solutions.description: Currently, tracking proposal engagement is manual. Our system offers real-time tracking and insights.

solutions.title: Reduced Stress
solutions.description: Proposal deadlines create pressure and stress. Automated generation reduces stress and increases focus on design.

solutions.title: Error-Free Proposals
solutions.description: Manual drafting can lead to errors. Our AI ensures accuracy in every proposal.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Duckiee's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Duckiee around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Duckiee.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Unlock the Digital Potential of Acme Corp with Thoughtful Design
proposal2.heroSubheadline: We offer a comprehensive plan to enhance your online visibility and conversion rates through custom WordPress solutions.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Every visitor who leaves your site without converting is revenue walking out the door.

problems.title: Low Search Visibility
problems.description: Without optimized search engine presence, potential customers can't find you. This leads to a significant loss in potential revenue.

problems.title: High Bounce Rate
problems.description: A cluttered site confuses visitors, causing them to leave. This results in a loss of potential sales.

problems.title: Slow Loading Times
problems.description: Each second of delay in page load time results in a 7% decrease in conversions. This is revenue slipping away.

problems.title: Poor Mobile Experience
problems.description: With more users on mobile, a poor mobile design means losing half of your potential clients.

problems.title: Unclear Branding
problems.description: Inconsistent branding confuses customers, leading to a loss of trust and sales opportunities.

problems.title: Lack of Analytics Insight
problems.description: Not understanding visitor behavior means missed opportunities for optimization and sales growth.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our tailored services directly address these issues, turning losses into gains.

solutions.title: SEO & Visibility
solutions.description: Enhance your search engine presence to capture more leads. Drive traffic that converts.

solutions.title: Responsive Design
solutions.description: Ensure a seamless experience across all devices. Increase engagement and conversions.

solutions.title: Performance Optimization
solutions.description: Boost your site's speed to keep visitors engaged. Reduce bounce rates effectively.

solutions.title: Analytics & Reporting
solutions.description: Gain insights into user behavior to refine strategies. Improve decision-making and ROI.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Partner with Duckiee for a thoughtful, strategic approach to web design.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: With years of experience, we create designs that deliver results.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric
whyUsCards.description: Your needs are our priority. We tailor every solution to fit your business.

whyUsCards.title: On-Time Delivery
whyUsCards.description: We respect your timelines and deliver projects when promised.

whyUsCards.title: Custom Solutions
whyUsCards.description: We build from the ground up to meet your specific challenges.

team.name: Kat Marriott
team.bio: Kat leads with a strategic vision, ensuring each client relationship is nurtured and driven by results.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's discuss how we can help. No strings attached, just a friendly chat.

lead.company_description:
A London based creative studio, operating nationwide, specialising in branding, graphic design and website development.

To increase your reach, build your brand, sell more, make an impact you need to communicate effectively. We help you do so either in print or online, or both!

Our approach is simple; from inception, through to the final stages, we complement our ‚Äòbig design agency' professionalism and capabilities with the friendliness and flexibility of a small business with a hands-on supportive approach.
